description: The only sweet treat my son would eat growing up!
name: No Bake Fruit Slice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Press mixture into tray lined with baking paper (I used a 27cm tray) and refrigerate for a few hours until set. Slice and serve.
